# EMURGO Academy Sparks presents: How to present a good proposal - 10 tips (Part 1)

![](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AOh14GjAG3dkLVjLNxmvrowQ8FZlDc5uioxOcwJ0iGUGxg=s96-c)

![](https://ucarecdn.com/b49891e8-5ef0-4798-ac3c-5ce0c0cbadb1/)

![](https://ucarecdn.com/b49891e8-5ef0-4798-ac3c-5ce0c0cbadb1/)

Welcome to the "EMURGO Academy Sparks" world. In this issue we offer you: 10 Tips - How to present a good proposal (Part 1). A good way to flex your proposer muscles in preparation to next year's February marathon. Enjoy it. <https://youtu.be/zCNtebVSE6Q>

Join to EMURGO Academy community: <https://t.me/+gFLm2bsoeFRkMTVl>
